Testing F2XM1 instruction
F2XM1 computes 2^x - 1

Test case 1:
x: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Expected: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Result: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Tag Word:     0x0400
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 1, C3: 0
PASS
